channel.title: Add New Items.... (Need Help)
channel.description:
Ok, When someone tries to buy, or pick up any new item, (godsword, fighter torso, defenders, etc...) they get dced and this comes up in the runserver.bat :
[code]java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 15334 at client.addItem(client.java:14508) at client.wear(client.java:14709) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:21864) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16786) at client.process(client.java:16758) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:53) $hawnScape[fatal] - exception[/code]
Please help me :)

yea if ur not usin silab client youll get dced every time

item.title: Add New Items.... (Need Help)
item.dc:creator: @trevor268 trevor268
item.description:
@trevor268 wrote:

oh its messed up in there

replace with this

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 1)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); if (/*newItemID <= 30000 && */newItemID >= 0) { addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount); } else { sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist."); } } catch(Exception e) { sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! "); }

Read full topic
